statements: UPDATE air_quality_levels SET pollutant_level = 15.6, city_name = 'New York' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE air_quality_levels SET monitoring_station = 'Station A', measurement_time = '2022-06-30 10:45:00' WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE air_quality_levels SET pollutant_level = 3.5, monitoring_station = 'Station A' WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND pollutant_type = 'PM2.5'
UPDATE air_quality_levels SET monitoring_station = 'Station B', measurement_time = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles' AND pollutant_level > 5.0
UPDATE air_quality_data SET pollution_level = 50, location = 'Park' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_devices SET operational_status = false WHERE device_id = 101;
UPDATE air_quality_data SET pollution_level = 75, timestamp = '2022-11-30 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_devices SET operational_status = FALSE, device_name = 'Sensor X' WHERE device_id = 3;
UPDATE AirQualityReading SET pollutant_level = 15.5 WHERE reading_id = 101;
UPDATE MonitoringStation SET city = 'New York' WHERE station_id = 201;
UPDATE AirQualityReading SET pollutant_level = 15.2, timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE reading_id = 101
UPDATE MonitoringStation SET city = 'New City', location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)'), station_name = 'Updated Station Name' WHERE station_id = 201
UPDATE air_quality_data SET pm25_level = 15.2, co_level = 0.8 WHERE sensor_id = 101
UPDATE locations SET city = 'Los Angeles' WHERE location_name = 'LA Central Park'
UPDATE air_quality_data SET pm25_level = 10.5, co_level = 3.2 WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND location_id = 201;
UPDATE locations SET city = 'New York', country = 'USA' WHERE location_id = 201;
UPDATE air_quality_station SET location = 'New York' WHERE station_id = 1;
UPDATE pollution_data SET value = 20.5 WHERE data_id = 3;
UPDATE air_quality_station SET location = 'New location', sensor_id = 12345 WHERE station_id = 1;
UPDATE pollution_data SET value = 15.67, sensor_id = 12345 WHERE data_id = 10;
